statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT anonymized_user_id FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE anonymized_user_id IS NULL ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND amount > 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(amount) > 200;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, address FROM users WHERE username = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email, address FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT username, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC, transaction_date DESC;

SELECT users.username, COUNT(transactions.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM users LEFT JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;

SELECT anon_transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM anon_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 5000 AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%son%') ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, name, email, phone_number FROM user_identities ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT anonymized_id, encrypted_name, encrypted_phone_number FROM anonymized_identities WHERE encrypted_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, count(log_id) AS total_logs FROM user_access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(log_id) > 10;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_identities WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_access FROM user_access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_access > 5;
SELECT * FROM anonymized_identities WHERE encrypted_email LIKE '%@example.com%' AND encrypted_phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT username, email FROM User WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM User WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM Transaction ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM AnonymizedUser ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM User ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM User WHERE user_id = 101 OR user_id = 102;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transaction WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT anonymous_username, anonymous_email FROM AnonymizedUser WHERE anonymous_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT function_name, COUNT(log_id) AS num_calls FROM FunctionLog GROUP BY function_name ORDER BY num_calls DESC;
